short_summary: Request for Proposals W0114-230005 Intensified Camera And Spectroscopic System
description: Request for Proposal of enhanced camera and spectroscopic system
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Contract Opportunity Title**

*W0114-230005 Intensified Camera and Spectroscopic System*

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: WS4266780988
* Solicitation Number: WS4266780988
* Publication Date: November 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 15, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST

## Contract Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the supply of an intensified camera and spectroscopic system.

## Contract Requirements

The contract will be awarded to the supplier who offers the lowest price, as per the selection criteria. The procurement method is competitive and selective.

## Trade Agreements

This tender opportunity is covered by the following Canada- Free Trade Agreement (FTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA):

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

## Deliverables and Details

The general delivery location is specified as Ontario (except NCR).

## Contact Information

For questions or clarification, please contact Stanley Chui, Contracting Officer, at (613) 1 995 5 2261 (local) or stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Access to Tender Documents**

Tender documents are available on the Ariba Discovery website at the Government of Canada's tendering website.

## Tender Cancellation

Please note that this tender opportunity has expired and is no longer open to submissions.

**Note on Expiration Date**

This tender opportunity has expired, and the specified tender closing date has passed. As a result, it will no longer be considered for evaluation or contract award.

I hope you have the final re-written entry. Let me know if you have any additional requests.
